country_code.description: The country code associated with the country.

country.description: The name of the country for which phone number data is provided.

uri.description: The URI to fetch more details about phone numbers in the country.

beta.description: Whether the phone number country data is in beta phase or not.

subresource_uris.description: URIs for accessing different types of phone numbers in the country.

local.description: URI for fetching local phone numbers in the country.

mobile.description: URI for fetching mobile phone numbers in the country.

toll_free.description: URI for fetching toll-free phone numbers in the country.
